title: Here Lies Balin, Son of Fundin (1C19)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to wound 2 Orcs or to wound 1 Orc twice.
Lore:	”'I have looked on Moria, and it is very great, but it has become dark and dreadful; and we have found no sign of my kindred.'”
Rarity:	C
